QuestData.Title: Trespassers in the Water
QuestData.Description: Shortly after Uldum's protective barriers fell, the Vir'naal river became afflicted with a terrible corruption.$B$BWhether it was brought here maliciously or accidentally is not of great significance.$B$BThe result is the same. As the river becomes clouded so does our ability to peer into what the future holds for us.$B$BLook outside, $c. These foul creatures were never meant to live in the pristine waters of our river.$B$BSlay them so that the river may grant us visions once again.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, $n. I can feel the disruption in the river fading.$B$BYet, I feel the source of this taint still lingers.
